verses.verse: Give ear <WH238> to my words, <WH561> Yahweh. <WH3068> Consider <WH995> my meditation. <WH1901>
Listen <WH7181> to the voice <WH6963> of my cry, <WH7773> my King <WH4428> and my God; <WH430> for to you do I pray. <WH6419>
Yahweh, <WH3068> in the morning <WH1242> you shall hear <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963> In the morning <WH1242> I will lay <WH6186> my requests before you, <WH6822> and will watch expectantly.
For you are not a God <WH410> who has pleasure <WH2655> in wickedness. <WH7562> Evil <WH7451> can't <WH1481> live with you.
The arrogant <WH1984> shall not stand <WH3320> in your sight. <WH5869> You hate <WH8130> all workers <WH6466> of iniquity. <WH205>
You will destroy <WH6> those who speak <WH1696> lies. <WH3577> Yahweh <WH3068> abhors <WH8581> the bloodthirsty <WH1818> and deceitful <WH4820> man. <WH376>

But as for me, <WH7230> in the abundance of your loving kindness <WH2617> I will come <WH935> into your house. <WH1004> I will bow <WH7812> toward your holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964> in reverence of you. <WH3374>
Lead <WH5148> me, <WH3068> Yahweh, in your righteousness <WH6666> because of my enemies. <WH8324> Make your way <WH1870> straight <WH3474> before my face. <WH6440>

For there is no faithfulness <WH3559> in their mouth. <WH6310> Their heart <WH7130> is destruction. <WH1942> Their throat <WH1627> is an open <WH6605> tomb. <WH6913> They flatter <WH2505> with their tongue. <WH3956>

Hold them guilty, <WH816> God. <WH430> Let them fall <WH5307> by their own counsels; <WH4156> Thrust them out <WH5080> in the multitude <WH7230> of their transgressions, <WH6588> for they have rebelled against you. <WH4784>

But let all those who take refuge <WH2620> in you rejoice, <WH8055> Let them always <WH5769> shout for joy, <WH7442> because you defend <WH5526> them. <WH157> Let them also who love your name <WH8034> be joyful in you. <WH5970>
For you will bless <WH1288> the righteous. <WH6662> Yahweh, <WH3068> you will surround <WH5849> him with favor <WH7522> as with a shield. <WH6793>
